ooscriptmaster
[Groovy] Class Functions

java.lang.Object
  ooscriptmaster.Functions

class Functions

Base class for all classes which provide ScriptMaster functions

Method Detail

paramRequired

static void paramRequired(java.lang.Object param)
Throw exception if parameter is null or empty.
Parameters:
param - parameter to validate

parseOptions

static java.util.Map parseOptions(java.lang.String opt, java.util.Map validOptions)
Convert user-provided string into a validated Map.
Parameters:
opt - list of key=value pairs
validOptions - map of key's that are allowed, and values to be used as default if not contained in options parameter
Returns:
map containing all the validOptions, with values overridden by opt

run

static java.lang.Object run(java.lang.Object instance, java.lang.String methodName, Object[] args = null)
Used to call a method from ScriptMaster. If a method is called directly, the lastError info will not be set if an Exception is not caught by the method.
Parameters:
instance - an instance of the object to call the method in
methodName - name of method to run
args - arguments for method
Returns:
result of method that was run

substitute

static java.lang.String substitute(java.lang.String value, java.util.Map replacements)
Similar to the Substitute() function in FileMaker: perform multiple replacements in one function.
Parameters:
value - to replace text in
replacements - : a Map of pairs to replace: ['\\\\':'/', '//':'/']
Returns:
value with specified replacements performed

success

static java.lang.Boolean success()
Set last error info to "No Error".
Returns:
Boolean true

success

static java.lang.Object success(java.lang.Object returnVal)
see success()
Parameters:
returnVal - value to return
Returns:
returnVal param
